short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Converts all Images on a WebPage to a Puppy 
Refresh the Page to remove the puppies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that converts all images on the screen, into the photo of a cute puppy. It works for most image sites including news portals, blogs and even google images! It's ideal for anyone who would want to avoid trigger images, gore, or just generally prefer more wholesome content around the web.
